lore: The Dialogus drowns out the war cries of the enemy with shouts of exalting praise to the God-Emperor. She broadcasts her liturgies to her Sisters through their vox-beads and sensor arrays, while her laud hailer amplifies the inspirational rhetoric of prayers and hymns all across the battlefield.

otherAbilities.name: Laud Hailer:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit can be selected as the target of Stratagems even when it is Battle-shocked .

otherAbilities.name: Stirring Rhetoric:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time this modelâ€™s unit performs an Act of Faith , the result of one of the Miracle dice used in that Act of Faith is first changed to a 6.
